title: Animator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Animate someone at night. The host will animate to the best of their ability what that player does that night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Framed players will always be animated as killing a player (method varies depending on what is causing them to be framed) and disguised players will always be animated as doing what whoever theyâ€™re disguised as is doing
